channel.title: gpmanila on Roy Tang
channel.description: Recent content in gpmanila on Roy Tang

item.title: New photos
item.author: hello@roytang.net (Roy Tang)
item.description: #gpmanila loot. Maybe next time I should stick to side events lol #mtg

item.title: New photos
item.author: hello@roytang.net (Roy Tang)
item.description: I guess my chaos sealed pool was okay #mtg #gpmanila

item.title: New note
item.author: hello@roytang.net (Roy Tang)
item.description:
Time for battle, wish me luck #gpmanila

[10:05] R1 1-2 loss vs ur kefnet rawr #gpmanila

[11:39] Rd2 1-2 loss vs rb hazoret. Sigh 0-2 start :(

[12:44] R3 1-2 loss vs uw i cant explain. Spell queller, reality smasher, gideon etc

[13:37] R4 2-0 vs monob zombies. Finally won a match! #gpmanila

[14:59] R5 0-2 vs temur marvel (mirror). Deds. Made the mistake of spinning on my turn when he had 6 energy. My ulamog died to his ulamog #gpmanila

item.title: New note
item.author: hello@roytang.net (Roy Tang)
item.description: Ugh hopefully i already used up all the bad luck and misplays today #gpmanila

item.title: New photos
item.author: hello@roytang.net (Roy Tang)
item.description: Luck ran out on day 2, finished #gpmanila at 37th, good enough for a bit of cash

item.title: New note
item.author: hello@roytang.net (Roy Tang)
item.description:
R10 0-2 vs uw heroic, 8-2 overall #gpmanila

[11:08] R11 2-1 vs abzan aggro 9-2 overall #gpmanila

[12:02] R12 2-0 vs mantis jeskai, 10-2 overall #gpmanila

[12:55] R13 0-2 vs mardu (feature match area) 10-3 overall #gpmanila

[14:01] R14 0-2 vs monored, 10-4 overall #gpmanila

[15:14] R15 2-1 vs abzan aggro, finish at 11-4. Cash! #gpmanila

[22:36] Oh wow, I was mentioned in the day 1 coverage https://i.imgur.com/ScchXAy.png #gpmanila

item.title: New note
item.author: hello@roytang.net (Roy Tang)
item.description:
R3 2-0 vs temur, 3-0 overall #gpmanila

[14:04] R4 2-0 vs temur, 4-0 overall #gpmanila

[15:19] R5 2-0 vs temur, 5-0 overall #gpmanila

[16:50] 0-2 vs abzan whip, 5-1 overall #gpmanila

[18:16] R7 2-0 vs monored, 6-1 overall #gpmanila

[19:37] R8 2-1 vs jeskai tokens, 7-1 overall. Day 2! #gpmanila

[20:34] R9 2-0 vs abzan (terry soh) finish day 1 at 8-1 #gpmanila

item.title: New note
item.author: hello@roytang.net (Roy Tang)
item.description:
Awaiting the first round of day 2. Relax, good luck, have fun

[10:48] Lost the 11th round, now at 8-3. #GPManila so much for top8 lol

[15:21] Got lucky vs solar flare to finish the gp at 11-4, should be in the money. The other 5 rounds were vs delver @_@ #GPManila

[18:11] My only sustenance for the past 12 hours was a bottle of mineral water and a kfc brownie from yesterday

[19:20] @magicprotour what’s up with people turning into zombies in the event coverage? https://imageshack.com/ lol #GPManila

[19:31] My final standing at GP Manila was 39th: http://twitpic.com/9xg2ht

item.title: New note
item.author: hello@roytang.net (Roy Tang)
item.description:
For everyone going into battle at GP Manila today: Relax, have fun, be lucky. :D

[09:01] Looks like around 1200 at gp manila lots more than I expected

[12:14] Started out 3-0 now the hard part begins #gpmnl

[18:35] Now at 6-2, must win the final round to advance to day 2 #gpmanila

[19:56] Aw crap, i’m playing tomorrow. It’s my first gp day 2! #achievementunlocked #gpmanila

[19:59] I’m not cut out for nine rounds anymore, my brain is already jelly.

[22:41] Salamat po sa mga supporters at sa mga bumati sa twitter (showbiz), pero wala pa po akong napapanalunan. Naiwasan ko lang maeliminate lol

[22:49] Exhausted after a whole day of Magic at GP Manila, but I finally managed to make day 2 of a GP. The battle continues tomorrow!

item.title: New note
item.author: hello@roytang.net (Roy Tang)
item.description: Unfortunately, I managed to scrub out at #gpmanila (#GPMan), 0-3 after byes. On the bright side, I heard Mitamura had that record for 3 GPs!

item.title: New note
item.author: hello@roytang.net (Roy Tang)
item.description: @aleksfelipe after watching zvi’s deck tech, payag na ako na eldrazi green ka for #gpmanila :D
